title: Sensei, Anata ni Chikazukitai
original_name: 先生、あなたに近づきたい
sinopse:
Takamine finally got his dream job as a high school teacher with his crush, Natsume. Now the two of them will be together, not as teacher and student, but as teacher and teacher. But does Takamine have an ulterior motive for becoming a teacher?

(Source: Exiled Rebels Scans)
